description:
Rod Daily and his friend David Stone are chillin' out, trying to focus on studying. When David decides to take a porn break on his laptop, Rod can't wait to put his rock hard erection to good use!

This study session heats up when David takes an interest in Rod's major...his major boner! Watch these diligent studs blow off some classroom stress in this very special after-school scene. Homework was never this hot!

Enjoy!
title: Homework or Sex?
